languages.text: {n}Маражает моргает — и на его лицо волной накатывает знакомое вам выражение угодливого подчинения. Он склоняет голову вниз и набок, показывая вам клеймо, а затем наклоняется еще ближе.{/n} "Я буду изобретателен в том, чтобы избежать сей участи. И начну... прямо сейчас".

{n}Marazhai blinks, and the servile submission you are used to seeing on his face slides back into place. He tilts his head down and to the side, showing you the brand, and then leans in even closer.{/n} "I will take great pains to avoid such a fate. And I will begin... right now."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражает моргает — и на его лицо волной накатывает знакомое вам выражение угодливого подчинения. Он склоняет голову вниз и набок, показывая вам клеймо, а затем наклоняется еще ближе.{/n} "Я буду изобретателен в том, чтобы избежать сей участи. И начну... прямо сейчас".

He tilts his head down and to the side, showing you the brand, and then leans in even closer.{/n} "I will take great pains to avoid such a fate. And I will begin... right now."

{n}Marazhai blinks, and the servile submission you are used to seeing on his face slides back into place. He tilts his head down and to the side, showing you the brand, and then leans in even closer.{/n} "I will take great pains to avoid such a fate. And I will begin... right now."

{n}Marazhai blinks, and the servile submission you are used to seeing on his face slides back into place. He tilts his head down and to the side, showing you the brand, and then leans in even closer.{/n} "I will take great pains to avoid such a fate. And I will begin... right now."

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋眨了眨眼，脸上重新浮现出你熟悉的卑微神色。他将头微微偏到一边，露出你留下的烙印，随后更加贴近到你身旁。{/n}“我会尽我所能，不让你感到厌倦……就从现在……开始。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai blinks, and the servile submission you are used to seeing on his face slides back into place. He tilts his head down and to the side, showing you the brand, and then leans in even closer.{/n} "I will take great pains to avoid such a fate. And I will begin... right now."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋眨了眨眼，脸上重新浮现出你熟悉的卑微神色。他将头微微偏到一边，露出你留下的烙印，随后更加贴近到你身旁。{/n}“我会尽我所能，不让你感到厌倦……就从现在……开始。”

languages.text: {n}Marazhai pestañea, y su expresión adopta de nuevo la dócil sumisión que acostumbras a ver en ella. Echa la cabeza a un lado y hacia abajo, mostrándote la marca, y luego se inclina aún más hacia ti.{/n} «Me someteré a mil tormentos si con ello evito semejante destino. Y empezaré... ahora mismo».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai blinks, and the servile submission you are used to seeing on his face slides back into place. He tilts his head down and to the side, showing you the brand, and then leans in even closer.{/n} "I will take great pains to avoid such a fate. And I will begin... right now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai pestañea, y su expresión adopta de nuevo la dócil sumisión que acostumbras a ver en ella. Echa la cabeza a un lado y hacia abajo, mostrándote la marca, y luego se inclina aún más hacia ti.{/n} «Me someteré a mil tormentos si con ello evito semejante destino. Y empezaré... ahora mismo».

languages.text: {n}Marazhai cligne des yeux et semble retrouver l'attitude servile qui vous est désormais si familière. Il penche la tête sur le côté afin de laisser apparaître sa marque et se rapproche encore plus de vous.{/n} « Je suis prêt à endurer de grandes souffrances afin d'éviter un tel destin. Dès maintenant, si c'est ce que vous désirez. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai blinks, and the servile submission you are used to seeing on his face slides back into place. He tilts his head down and to the side, showing you the brand, and then leans in even closer.{/n} "I will take great pains to avoid such a fate. And I will begin... right now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai cligne des yeux et semble retrouver l'attitude servile qui vous est désormais si familière. Il penche la tête sur le côté afin de laisser apparaître sa marque et se rapproche encore plus de vous.{/n} « Je suis prêt à endurer de grandes souffrances afin d'éviter un tel destin. Dès maintenant, si c'est ce que vous désirez. »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai blinzelt und seine gewohnte sklavische Unterwürfigkeit kehrt ins Gesicht zurück. Er neigt den Kopf seitlich nach unten, um dir das Brandmal zu zeigen, und beugt sich noch weiter vor.{/n} "Ich werde mir große Mühe geben, dieses Schicksal zu vermeiden. Und ich werde ... direkt damit beginnen."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai blinks, and the servile submission you are used to seeing on his face slides back into place. He tilts his head down and to the side, showing you the brand, and then leans in even closer.{/n} "I will take great pains to avoid such a fate. And I will begin... right now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai blinzelt und seine gewohnte sklavische Unterwürfigkeit kehrt ins Gesicht zurück. Er neigt den Kopf seitlich nach unten, um dir das Brandmal zu zeigen, und beugt sich noch weiter vor.{/n} "Ich werde mir große Mühe geben, dieses Schicksal zu vermeiden. Und ich werde ... direkt damit beginnen."

languages.text: {n}マラズハイが瞬きをする。次の瞬間には、あなたが見慣れてた従順な服従の表情に戻る。頭を下げて横を向くことで烙印を見せ、さらに身を乗り出してくる。{/n}「そのような運命を避けるために、俺は細心の注意を払ってきたんだ。そして始めるのさ…今すぐにな」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai blinks, and the servile submission you are used to seeing on his face slides back into place. He tilts his head down and to the side, showing you the brand, and then leans in even closer.{/n} "I will take great pains to avoid such a fate. And I will begin... right now."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイが瞬きをする。次の瞬間には、あなたが見慣れてた従順な服従の表情に戻る。頭を下げて横を向くことで烙印を見せ、さらに身を乗り出してくる。{/n}「そのような運命を避けるために、俺は細心の注意を払ってきたんだ。そして始めるのさ…今すぐにな」

languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai blinks, and the servile submission you are used to seeing on his face slides back into place. He tilts his head down and to the side, showing you the brand, and then leans in even closer.{/n} "I will take great pains to avoid such a fate. And I will begin... right now."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai gözlerini kırpıyor. Ardından yüzünde görmeye aşina olduğun o kölelere yaraşan itaatkârlık, tekrar yerini alıyor. Başını öne ve yana eğerek sana damgasını gösteriyor, sonrasında daha da yaklaşıyor.{/n} "Böylesi bir kaderden kaçınmak için büyük acılara katlanmaya razıyım. Buna da hemen şimdi... Başlıyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai blinks, and the servile submission you are used to seeing on his face slides back into place. He tilts his head down and to the side, showing you the brand, and then leans in even closer.{/n} "I will take great pains to avoid such a fate. And I will begin... right now."

Başını öne ve yana eğerek sana damgasını gösteriyor ve sonrasında daha da yaklaşıyor.{/n} "Böylesi bir kaderden kaçınmak için büyük acılara katlanmaya razıyım. Buna da hemen şimdi... Başlıyorum."
